answers.answer: well i have gestational diabetes, and was told if your sugar is constantly high it can cause the baby's stomach to grow twice as fast as the rest of the baby! definitely motivation to keep my sugars in check!
There is some correlation but its not all the time. Bythis iI mean my aunt who is a tiny woman gained 15 pounds and had a 10.6lb baby with no GD or other issues

I dont have gestational diabetes but was told at 32weeks my baby was well above average size.i am 5ft 3 and of small frame.im now 34 weeks.from the back u wouldnt know i was pregnant, from the front i am gigantic! I eat everything and anything.i do my best to eat healthy foods but do have a sweet tooth too.they are bringing me in for a section in 4weeks time (38wks) cos im so big.
Idk I put on around 90lbs with my 1st and she was only 7lbs 8oz and gained around 70lbs with my 2nd and she was only 6lb 7oz
Oh ok thanks ladies it looks like it is not only that and sometimes it id just genes and bone structure probably....

My first born at 41.5 weeks was 7lbs 6oz i gained 25lbs. This time ive gained 20lbs im 39 weeks so idk how big my baby is but at my 28wk ultrasound he was measuring 1.5 weeks too big but i had been on an asprin regiment for 8 weeks to increase blood flow to my uterus so i think thats y he was big so they stopped the aspirin

With my son I started at 125 and ended up at 189, so I gained 64 lbs. My ex wasnt a humongous guy either. He was 6' and about 190 lbs. so a pretty normal size.  I pretty much just ate and ate whatever I wanted. He weighed 10 lbs 3 oz. I didn't have gestational diabetes even tho they thought I might because me and the baby were growing so rapidly. I did go 2 weeks over my due date, however. So I think a combo of the weight and being overdue was the reason my son was so big.

I gained about 30-50lbs in my first 2 pregnancies. Cant remember exactly and both my kids were 22in long and 9lbs. This one Ive gained about 30 and the baby is measuring over 8lbs!I have never had GD either! I just grow em big!

I gained 49 pounds with my first and he weighed 6lbs 15oz and with my second I gained 27 pounds and he weighed 6lbs 10oz I dont know what causes a big baby honestly my mom gained the most weight with my older sister almost 80 pounds and my sister only weighed 7lbs 15oz, she gained about 40 with me and I weighed 8lbs 2oz, and then with my younger sister she only gained 25 pounds but my little sister weighed 10lbs 11 1/2oz
I Gained Under 5Lbs With My First Baby...Much Die To Losing Quite A Bit The First Few Months... He Was Born At 6Lbs 14Oz. My Friend Gained 80Lbs With Her Little One And Baby Was Just Over 7Lbs.
I gained 60lbs with my first and she was 8lbs 3oz. I gained 23lbs with my second and she was 8lbs 1oz so I havent seen a difference personally

question: Hellop...is it true that babies become bigger mostly when moms are eating more and mostly carbs..therefore have put more weight. Im trying to see if there is a connection of becoming bigger and of it correlates to the size of the baby as wel..arent there other factors which count for the baby to be measuring more weeks then it is actually in....
title: when babies grow bigger
